description.en: This seminar is designed to teach the doctoral students the key points that should exist in a publishable academic paper and to develop the critical thinking skills of these students. The students will learn what to do and what to avoid when writing papers and what the requirements are for mature papers. Doctoral students are expected to give a critical review of the paper(s) at the seminar and to present their views.
description.et: Käesolev seminar aitab doktorantidel aru saada, millised on põhinõuded avaldatava teadusartikli kirjutamisel, ta arendab ka nende kriitilist mõtlemisviisi. Doktorandid teadvustavad, mida teha ja mida vältida akadeemiliste artiklite kirjutamisel ja milliseid nõudeid esitatakse avaldamisküpsetele artiklitele. Doktorantidelt eeldatakse seminaris artikli(te)st kriitilise ülevaate andmist ja oma seisukohatade esitamist.

objectives.en: The purpose of the course is to develop the analytical skills of graduate students and train them to work with literature.
objectives.et: Kursuse eesmärgiks on kirjanduse analüüsi kaudu  arendada kraadiõppe tudengite kriitilise analüüsi oskusi.

learning_outcomes.en: The student develops critical thinking when they read academic papers
learning_outcomes.et: - omandavad kriitilise mõtlemise oskused teadustekstide lugemisel

learning_outcomes.en: The student knows the key aspects of writing publishable academic papers
learning_outcomes.et: - teavad, millised on põhinõuded avaldatava teadusartikli kirjutamisel

learning_outcomes.en: The student learns how to write referee reports
